principle_scores.name: Dark/Black Slimming
principle_scores.reasoning: color_lightness: 0.9 >>  | Light color (L=0.90): slight expansion penalty = -0.04
prompt_input_reasoning: Evaluating Dark/Black Slimming: how this garment's color creates visual slimming or expansion effects for your body
Con: This garment has a light color which can visually expand the areas it covers, making them appear slightly larger, -0.04

principle_scores.name: A-Line Balance
prompt_input_reasoning: Evaluating A-Line Balance: how this garment's A-line silhouette creates balance and flatters your figure
This garment doesn't have enough flare to be considered an A-line silhouette — not applicable

principle_scores.name: Bodycon Mapping
principle_scores.reasoning: expansion_rate: 0.02 >>  | gsm_estimated: 110; is_structured: true >>  | isThin: false; isStructured: true >>  | body_shape: apple; is_athletic: false; belly_zone: 0.7 >>  | Apple + structured bodycon: -0.12

principle_scores.name: Matte Zone

prompt_input_reasoning: Evaluating Matte Zone: how this garment's fabric sheen (matte vs shiny) affects perceived body volume
Pro: This garment has a deeply matte fabric that absorbs light rather than reflecting it, creating a slimming effect, +0.08
Pro: For your apple body shape with this garment, the matte fabric's slimming effect is especially beneficial for your midsection, (x1.5)

principle_scores.name: V-Neck Elongation
prompt_input_reasoning: Analyzing how this garment's neckline affects your vertical proportions
Pro: This garment's scoop neckline creates mild vertical elongation by drawing the eye downward from the face, +0.05

principle_scores.name: Fabric Zone
principle_scores.reasoning: Fabric zone: stretch=0.0%, GSM=99, sheen=0.10, gsm_conf=high(×1)
prompt_input_reasoning: Assessing how this garment's fabric properties (cling, structure, drape) work with your body type
Pro: This garment has a fabric that skims rather than clings, creating a flattering silhouette, +0.10
Pro: This garment has a structured fabric that provides support and creates a polished silhouette, +0.15
Con: This garment has a stiff fabric that holds its own shape rather than following your body's contours, -0.10

principle_scores.name: Neckline Compound
principle_scores.reasoning: Bust: depth=3.1", threshold=7.0", ratio=0.45, score=+0.30 | Compound: bust=+0.30*0.4 + torso=+0.07*0.3 + balance=+0.15*0.3 = +0.18
prompt_input_reasoning: Evaluating Neckline Compound: how this garment's V-neckline depth flatters your bust and creates torso slimming
Pro: This garment has a conservative V-neck depth that flatters without being too revealing, +0.30
Pro: For your apple body shape with this garment, the V-neckline's torso-slimming effect is especially beneficial for minimizing your midsection, (x1.30)
